law.catch_line: Application of KRS 237.138 to 237.142 to retired peace officers.
law.text:
KRS 237.138 to 237.142 shall apply to any elected or appointed peace officer who is honorably retired and who:
Meets the provisions of the federal Law Enforcement Officers Safety Act, 18 U.S.C. sec. 926C;
Meets the provisions of KRS 237.138 to 237.142; and
Desires to carry a concealed deadly weapon in conformity with the provisions of the federal Law Enforcement Officers Safety Act, 18 U.S.C. sec. 926C.
law.history: Amended 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 18, sec. 1, effective July 12, 2012. -- Amended 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 240, sec. 5, effective July 12, 2006. -- Created 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 182, sec. 11, effective March 31, 2005.
